alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 10:20PM CDT until April 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Worth County in north central Iowa... Northern Cerro Gordo County in north central Iowa... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1020 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mason City Municipal Airport, or 8 miles west of Mason City, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mason City around 1025 PM CDT. Manly around 1030 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 191 and 218. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Iowa.
